text: [论文]《Gradient-based Hyperparameter Optimization through Reversible Learning》(2015) D Maclaurin, D Duvenaud, RP Adams http://t.cn/RwMkaFD 来自Harvard，提出超参优化的梯度计算新思路，“...opens up a garden of delights”，很有意思的论文，推荐，相关实验&图表: http://t.cn/RwMDcc2
